to_radec¶

clustertools.analysis.operations.to_radec(cluster, do_key_params=False, ro=8.0, vo=220.0)[source]¶

NAME:

to_radec

PURPOSE:

Convert to on-sky position, proper motion, and radial velocity of cluster

INPUT:

None

OUTPUT:

ra,dec,dist,pmra,pmdec,vlos

HISTORY:

2019 - Written - Webb (UofT)
